quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), 9 Model District Disability Centre (DDRCs) has been inaugurated with the objective of strengthen and conversion of DDRCs into Model DDRCs at their existing locations to provide effective and qualitative rehabilitation services to PwDs (Person with Disability). It has been conceptualised by the ___________.
options: Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disability
Ministry of Home Affairs
NHRC
NITI Aayog
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following ministries/institutions has organised the 5th Rashtriya Poshan Maah in the month of September to convert ‘Jan Andolan’ into ‘Jan Bhagidari’ and to fulfill the vision of a ‘Suposhit Bharat’?
options: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
Ministry of Women and Child Development
NITI Aayog
National Commission for Women
None of the Above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, National Cadet Corps (NCC) has signed MoU with which of the following institutions/organisations?
options: UNEP
UNDP
World Bank
NITI Aayog
None of the Above

quiz.text: ‘Puneet Sagar Abhiyan’ was launched on __________.
options: 1 June 2021
1 Dec 2020
1 Dec 2021
1 Jan 2022
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Ministry of Panchayat Raj has organized National Workshop on Localization of Sustainable Development Goals in Gram Panchayats through Adopting Thematic Approaches i.e. Theme 4 & 5. What is theme 5 that has been adopted in workshop?
options: Water Sufficient Gram Panchayat
Clean & Green Gram Panchayat
Healthy Gram Panchayat
Child Friendly Gram Panchayat
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Agni Tattva - Energy for LiFE (Lifestyle for the Environment) initiative was launched under the umbrella campaign of Sumangalam. Sumangalam campaign is an initiative of __________.
options: UNEP
UNFCCC
Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh
Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
None of the Above

quiz.text: What does ‘C’ stands for in acronym SCALE?
options: Climate
Conceptual
Certification
Calculate
Capability

quiz.text: The above mentioned app is an initiative of __________.
options: Capital Goods Skills Council
Leather Sector Skill Council
Domestic Workers Sector Skill Council
Skill Council for Green Jobs
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Defence Accounts Department has signed an MoU with Bank of Baroda and __________ to on board these banks as Service Centres under the System for Pension Administration (Raksha)/ (SPARSH) initiative.
options: SBI
HDFC Bank
PNB
ICICI Bank
Bank of India

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), an agreement has been signed between the Institut National de la Propriété Industrielle (INPI), France and Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR) on the Traditional Knowledge Digital Library (TKDL) Access. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to TKDL?
options: It was established in 2005
Established by collaboration between CSIR and Ministry of AYUSH
Objective is to prevent the erroneous grant of patents on Indian traditional knowledge (TK) and deter misappropriation of the country’s traditional knowledge
1 & 2 only
2 & 3 only

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister of Tourism has attended Tourism Ministers’ meeting of the BRICS nations. Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding ‘BRICS alliance for Green Tourism’ that has been discussed during the meeting?
options: It was launched in 2021
It promotes measures which can shape a more resilient, sustainable and inclusive tourism sector
It provides importance to implement United Nations (UN) 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development and promoting sustainable development in the tourism sector
1 & 2 only
1, 2 & 3

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Minister of State for Commerce and Industry has attended 10th East Asia Summit (EAS) EMM (Economic Ministers’ Meeting) which has been organized to mitigate the economic impact of the pandemic and strengthening regional economy. East Asia Summit has been established in which of the following years?
options: 2000
2005
2010
2015
2020

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information shared by Union Agriculture Minister, government expects to increase fish production to _________ by 2024-2025.
options: 220 lakh tonnes
230 lakh tonnes
240 lakh tonnes
250 lakh tonnes
260 lakh tonnes

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information shared by Union Defence Minister, highest ever Defence exports of __________ have been reported for financial year 2021-22.
options: Rs 12,415 crore
Rs 12,515 crore
Rs 12,615 crore
Rs 12,815 crore
Rs 12,715 crore

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information, low carbon technologies will help in saving foreign exchange of about __________ per annum for the country.
options: Rs. 10,000 crore
Rs. 20,000 crore
Rs. 30,000 crore
Rs. 40,000 crore
Rs. 50,000 crore

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister of Tourism has attended National Conference of State Tourism Ministers. Which of the following information is/are correct that has been shared during the conference?
options: A National Tourism Policy has been drafted to revive India’s Tourism and achieve USD 1 Trillion contribution in economy by this sector in 2047
Ministry has sanctioned Rs 7000 crores for development of tourism infrastructure
To increase air connectivity, number of airports will be increased to 300 by 2025
1 & 2 only
1, 2 & 3

quiz.text: How many cities with million plus citizens have registered for the above mentioned league?
options: 40
42
47
52
57

quiz.text: Which of the following states has topped with maximum participation based on percentage of Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) participating in the above mentioned league?
options: Kerala
Tamil Nadu
Assam
Odisha
Chhattisgarh

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), a total of 306 children of 33 Districts of 14 Lok Sabha Constituencies in Assam have been awarded by Healthy Child Award. Which of the following is/are the objectives of Healthy Child Award?
options: To identify healthy children in age group of 6 month-3 years and 3-5 years
To promote a sense of constructive competition among parents for their child’s health
To generate awareness and conduct campaigns for growth measurement of children
To mobilize community participation for health and nutritional wellness in the State
All of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Project Saaras has been launched to promote women empowerment, menstrual hygiene and awareness. This project has been launched by __________ embassy in India in collaboration with Khushii Foundation.
options: Saudi Arabia
UAE
Oman
Israel
South Africa

quiz.text:
Recently (Sep 2022), the Prime Minister of India has launched the National Logistics Policy (NLP). Which of the following is/are the aim/s of this policy?

A. To use technologies such as Artificial Intelligence and Block-chain in logistics

B. Reducing India’s logistics cost to be comparable to global benchmarks by 2025

C. To be among the top 25 countries by 2030 in the Logistics Performance Index (LPI)
options: A only
A and B only
B and C only
A and C only
All of the Above

quiz.text: With which of the following institutions, Government of India is in talks to introduce a risk-sharing mechanism to compensate banks giving loans for electric vehicle (EV) purchases?
options: ADB
UNDP
World Bank
IMF
UNEP

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Cabinet has approved the inclusion of several communities in the Schedule Tribes list of the Constitution across 4 states, as part of the Constitution (Scheduled Tribes) Order (Amendment) Bill 2022. Which of the following communities has been added in the list?
options: Hatti community from Himachal Pradesh
Narikoravan and Kurivikkaran communities from Tamil Nadu
Betta-Kuruba community as a synonym of ‘Kadu Kuruba’ from Karnataka
Gond tribe and its five sub-castes, to be recognised as ST in 4 districts of Uttar Pradesh
All of the Above

quiz.text: As per recent (Sep 2022) information shared by Union Minister of MSME, MSMEs accounts for __________ of the country's total exports.
options: 30%
40%
50%
60%
70%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister of State for Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions has launched the SCDPM (Special Campaign for Disposal of Pending Matters) 2.0 Portal with the objective of _________.
options: Timely disposal of references (reducing pendency)
Clean work space (Swachhata)
Legal Awareness
1 & 2 only
All of the Above
